block.utilia.suppressor.tooltip: Blocks item entity spawns in a range.
block.utilia.domesticated_bedrock.toolti: Unbreakable unless sneaking. Does not withstand the Wither.
item.utilia.long_fall_boots.lore: "We told this test subject to just go ahead and try to land on her head. She can't do it. Good work, boots."
item.utilia.light_arrow.tooltip: Deals %d magic damage. Unstackable, too powerful to share an inventory with another Arrow of Light.
item.utilia.light_arrow.lore: You're lucky it doesn't break your crossbow this time.
tooltip.utilia.wip: (CURRENTLY A WORK IN PROGRESS. DO NOT USE.)
